actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution to urge the restoration of the status of amateur athlete for the late Jim Thorpe, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the Senate that the Amateur Athletic Union restore to the late Jim Thorpe the status of amateur athlete. Makes it the sense of the Senate that the International Olympic Committee officially recognize the achievements of Jim Thorpe during the 1912 Olympic Games.

titles.title: A resolution to urge the restoration of the status of amateur athlete for the late Jim Thorpe, and for other purposes.
